pages.text: Food that your cat will eat.

pages.title: Fish
pages.text: This is the food that your cat will always eat.

pages.title: Meat
pages.text: If you allocate 3 points in the Happy Eater talent, you can feed your cat all sorts of meat.

pages.title: Rotten Flesh
pages.text: If you allocate 5 points in the Happy Eater talent, you can even feed your cat that disgusting stuff that drops from zombies.
